name: hugo-theme-bootstrap4-blog
description: A Bootstrap v4 theme for the Hugo static site generator.

scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style compressed source/scss/style.scss static/css/style.css.tmp && cssnano static/css/style.css.tmp static/css/style.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts && npm run clean

author: Alan Orth
